<?xml version="1.0"?> <configuration> <configSections> <section name="viddlerV2" type="Viddler.ViddlerConfigurationSection, ViddlerV2" /> </configSections> <viddlerV2 apiKey="xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx" baseUrl="http://api.viddler.com/api/v2/" secureBaseUrl="https://api.viddler.com/api/v2/" enableSsl="true" /> </configuration>
